# clearStart()

**Instance Method**

Clears linkage to another animation that causes the receiver to start.

## Declaration

```swift
func clearStart()
```

## Discussion

The linkage to the other animation is made with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAnimation/start(when:reachesProgress:)].

## Related Documentation

- **start()**: Starts the animation represented by the receiver.

## Linking Animations Together

- **start(when:reachesProgress:)**: Starts running the animation represented by the receiver when another animation reaches a specific progress mark.
- **stop(when:reachesProgress:)**: Stops running the animation represented by the receiver when another animation reaches a specific progress mark.
- **clearStop()**: Clears linkage to another animation that causes the receiver to stop.
